answers.answer: Honestly you don't have to be worried about a c section, plenty of women love their c section. Plus you need to be worried about what's best for the baby and if your ob is saying that's the best option that's more than likely the best option.
Yeah I'm sure I'll take my doctor's opinion. I'm just curious about women's experiences.
Episiotomy might be better than a c section
I would suggest to cut back on fatty food and eat super healthy so baby doesn't grow a lot so it wont have to result into a c section.

question: I'm almost 39 weeks and I just had an ultrasound because I have gestational diabetes and my doctor is worried about the baby's head size. We found out his head is in the 98th percentile and he weighs 8.5 pounds. The doctor recommended a C section. What are your guys' opinions or experiences?? I'll talk more to my doctor tomorrow about it, but I'd like to do as much research as I can first. Please share!
title: Please give your opinion!
